subject: Drug Abuse and Traffic
Prisons and Prisoners
Cocaine and Crack Cocaine
lead_paragraph: Mike Tyson was sentenced in Mesa, Ariz., to 24 hours in jail and three years’ probation for drug possession and driving under the influence. Tyson pleaded guilty in September to a single felony count of cocaine possession and a misdemeanor D.U.I. count. Tyson, 41, had faced a possible maximum sentence of four years and three months in prison.
